items.title: Eight open NFL coaching jobs, eight predicted hires: Who will land in Baltimore, Atlanta, New York?
items.description: Could three coaches who were just fired immediately find new teams? With interviews taking place this week, we projected candidates to fill open jobs.

items.title: How Miami offensive coordinator Shannon Dawson emerged from nowhere
items.description: The architect of the Hurricane offense began his career grinding for a job at Southeastern Louisiana.

items.title: CFP National Title first look: Previewing Miami-Indiana
items.description: How either Miami or Indiana can win the title, plus X factors for both teams.

items.title: Can breakout star Leo Carlsson get the Ducks back on track?
items.description: Following a hot start, the Ducks are now on the outside looking in at the playoff race.

items.title: Answering the biggest questions regarding Brooks Koepka's return to the PGA Tour
items.description: How will LIV Golf react? Will other LIV Golf stars follow Koepka back to the PGA Tour? How much will golf fans see Koepka on the PGA Tour this season?
